short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize viewed listings on the offcampus.uwo.ca site

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple organizer for Western Off-campus housing site that allows you to filter already viewed listings. 

Makes sure you don't have to see postings you've already rejected.
